1.content:
Like I said, there are 4 categories of characters to play with: Cartoon and Original are the Top Categories while Human and Furry are the Sub-Categories.

Let's get started!
1.title: Deciding on a Girl

11.content:
So, you've chosen the animated route! Most people would, as they stand the chance of playing with someone they recognize!

Now for the Sub-Categories...
11.title: Cartoon

111.content:
Okay, so you're a furry guy! I like your style! Not afraid to cough up some hairballs and to get some dander on your shirt. Well, lucky for you, I've got plenty to choose from!

Who's the lucky girl?
111.title: Furry

1113.content:
Okay, none of them suited you? That's cool. I can understand Jeanette's voice would probably grate on your nerves pretty fast, and Cream the Rabbit is... well... I dunno, if that's not your thing, that's cool.

I've got some more choices.
1113.title: Go on...

choices: I don't like any of these girls.
11133.content: Go on?.. But... I've only got one left! And... well... I understand... maybe you're not a brony, maybe Pistol is TOO young for you (by far the youngest in our little motley crew)... it doesn't matter. I've got one more. And if you don't like her, you'll have to turn back.
11133.title: Go on...

111331.content: Are you sure? I'm doing this because the other option is the end.
111331.title: Olivia Flaversham  (The Great Mouse Detective)

111332.content: You've reached the end of the line... maybe furry isn't your thing... maybe you should stick to humans.
111332.title: I don't like any of these girls.

112.content:
Sticking with your own species. That's fine by me! You're not a fan of coughing up furballs, and there's nothing wrong with that. Who wants that?

So... who's the lucky girl?
112.title: Human

1123.content: Didn't find the right one in the last one? I got you! You're not a candy guy, and you're certainly not a fan of rocks. It's okay, though, there's more.
1123.title: Go on...

choices: I don't like any of these girls.
11233.content:
Oh... you didn't like those girls either? Huh... I can understand Coraline and her thing with the supernatural scaring you off, but I thought you'd love to get your hands on some of Kuki's Rainbow Monkeys!

*sigh*

Okay, I've got one more girl... and if you don't like her, you're gonna have to turn back for the other 15.
11233.title: Go on...

112331.content: Are you sure? I'm doing this because the other option is the end.
112331.title: Zelda  (Ocarina of Time)

112332.content: Well, then I don't know what to tell you... maybe there's an original girl who'd peak your interest...
112332.title: I don't like any of these girls.

12.content:
So, you've decided to brave the path less traveled, and to meet some new faces you've never met! There's courage in you, I like that!

Now, for the Sub-Categories!
12.title: Original

choices: Jenny, the shy bookworm of a mouse
121.content:
Okay, so you're a furry guy! I like your style! Not afraid to cough up some hairballs and to get some dander on your shirt. Well, lucky for you, I've got plenty to choose from!

Who's the lucky girl?
121.title: Furry

choices: Amy, the rich and clumsy bunny
1213.content: Okay, so you're not a dog person, and you're not a fan of bookworms. That's okay, though. Not everyone likes dogs. (I'm a cat person myself.) I've got other choices though.
1213.title: Go on...

choices: Nikki, the poor, shy but sly fox.
I don't like any of these girls.
12133.content:
Seriously? I thought Tammy-Lynn would have persuaded you for sure! I mean, come on!!! A kitty girl in overalls with short, fluffy blond hair?!!

It's okay, though. I've got one more. If you don't like her... you'll have to turn back.
12133.title: Go on...

121332.content: Well, then we're done here. Turn back and pick a different category.
121332.title: I don't like any of these girls.

122.content:
Sticking with your own species. That's fine by me! You're not a fan of coughing up furballs, and there's nothing wrong with that. Who wants that?

So... who's the lucky girl?
122.title: Human

choices: Jamie, the soft spoken ballerina and artist
1223.content: Okay, I can understand skipping those girls. Vanessa has a mean right cross and Avery is kind of hard to figure out. Not to worry, though, I've got more.
1223.title: Go on...

choices: I don't like any of these girls.
12233.content: Okay, I'm trying hard, reader... but I only have 20 girls and you're not making this easy. I've got one more, and if you don't like her, you'll have to turn back.
12233.title: Go on...

122332.content: Well then... go back... there's nothing for you here.
122332.title: I don't like any of these girls.

info.brief_description: 20 different girls, cartoon, regular, furry or human, have fun with fetishes.
info.description:
Little Girls, Big Fetishes

Welcome to my first ever interactive story! I'm excited to get started, so let's not waste any time.

Before I start, if you don't like kiddy stuff, or fetish stuff, leave now. This isn't for you.

In this story are 20 girls between the ages of 5 and 12. 10 cartoon characters, 10 regular, original characters, 10 humans, and 10 furries, all waiting for you to join them in their adventures into their foray with fetishes of many kinds. You may join then either as their friend, their cousin, their babysitter, or you can play as them if you wish. Just be sure that if you play as one of the girls, you must write the story in 1st person.

I must warn you, that the contents of the following story aren't guaranteed to be graphic, but have the potential to be graphic, should you make that choice. And I will make sure you have that choice to begin with. For example, you have a girl, and you're going to inflate her. Now, either you can choose the graphic route, filling her up in a rapey kind of way up the bum or crotch, or you can choose the SFW route and put a tube in her mouth, blowing her up like a balloon for fun! That choice is yours to make.

Now, some fetishes are unavailable to some characters. For example, pregnancy or unbirth is unavailable for Pistol Pete, as she's just that young, or Vanessa can't be dominated as she is in no way submissive. Things like that.

Well, what are you waiting for? The girls are waiting for you inside!
